title: Beautiful 1 bed 1 bath in Rose Hill/Gramercy
posting_body: ['NO FEE!!', '1 Bed 1 Bath - Available Now!!', '1 Year Lease - $3750', 'Beautiful 1 bed 1 bath in the Rose Hill/Gramercy area!', 'This newly renovated apartment features, crown molding, deco fireplace, exposed brick throughout, a gorgeous, updated kitchen with stainless steel appliances including: microwave, dishwasher, fridge, gas stove, and wine cooler!', 'Not to mention in-unit washer/dryer!', 'Neighborhood -', '*Baruch College', '*Endless food options and shopping steps away on 3rd Ave!', '*NYU’s Bellevue Hospital', '*NYU’s College of Dentistry', '*Bellevue South park', '*Gramercy park', '*VA NY Harbor Healthcare.', '*AMC Movie Theatre', 'Must have 670+ credit and make 40x rent annually, or have a guarantor who has 700 credit score and makes 80x rent annually.', '3rd Party guarantors accepted!', 'To schedule a showing, contact Tim or Ken']
